itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Silkworm Cocoons.

item.name: Silkworm Cocoon
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: The method for obtaining it is unknown.

item.name: Krea Trinket of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Krea Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Trinket of Temptation, Krea Trinket

item.name: Krea Trinket of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Krea Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Trinket of Destruction, Krea Trinket

item.name: Krea Trinket of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Krea Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Trinket of Crimson Flame, Krea Trinket

item.name: Krea Trinket
item.desc: A trinket crafted to meet the strict requirements of adventurers.

item.name: Ultimate Krea Trinket
item.desc: A Krea Trinket developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Trinket of Crimson Flame, Krea Trinket of Destruction, Krea Trinket of Temptation, Krea Trinket

item.name: Silk
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: Silk Thread can be obtained by Grinding Silkworm Cocoon. It requires the knowledge of Grinding: Beginner.

※ Find Ornella in Heidel and complete the Materials for Equipment Repair Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Krea Ornamental Knot of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Krea Ornamental Knot.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Ornamental Knot of Destruction, Krea Ornamental Knot

item.name: Krea Ornamental Knot of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Krea Ornamental Knot.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Ornamental Knot of Crimson Flame, Krea Ornamental Knot

item.name: Krea Ornamental Knot
item.desc: An ornamental knot crafted to meet the strict requirements of adventurers.

item.name: Ultimate Krea Ornamental Knot
item.desc: Krea Ornamental Knot developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Ornamental Knot of Crimson Flame, Krea Ornamental Knot of Destruction, Krea Ornamental Knot of Temptation, Krea Ornamental Knot

item.name: Krea Ornamental Knot of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Krea Ornamental Knot.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Ornamental Knot of Temptation, Krea Ornamental Knot
